name: Slackin
description: Let people invite themselves to your Slack

SLACK_API_TOKEN.description: A Slack API token (find it on https://api.slack.com/web)

SLACK_CHANNEL.description: Name of a single guest channel to invite them to (leave blank for a normal, all-channel invite)

SLACK_RESTRICT.description: If it's a restricted (guest) account enter 'true' or not (leave empty for full memeber)

BADGE_HEIGHT.description: Badge heigh for the svg (eave blank for a normal, with equal the badge width)

RETRY_INTERVAL.description: Retry data lookup interval (Slack limits this for API calls) defaults to 15000 (15 seconds)

DEBUG.description: Output more data set to 'true' to turn on, leave blank to turn off
